00038 #ifndef _PLT_ARGUMENT_H_
00039 #define _PLT_ARGUMENT_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 
00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   forward declarations
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 class PLT_StateVariable;
00050 class PLT_Argument;
00051 class PLT_ActionDesc;
00052 typedef NPT_Array<PLT_Argument*> PLT_Arguments;
00053 
00054 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 |   PLT_ArgumentDesc
00056 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 class PLT_ArgumentDesc
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     PLT_ArgumentDesc(const char*        name,
00067                      NPT_Ordinal        position,
00068                      const char*        direction = "in",
00069                      PLT_StateVariable* variable = NULL, 
00070                      bool               has_ret = false);
00071 
00072     // accessor methods
00073     NPT_Result         GetSCPDXML(NPT_XmlElementNode* node);
00074     const NPT_String&  GetName() const { return m_Name; }
00075     const NPT_String&  GetDirection() const { return m_Direction; }
00076     NPT_Ordinal        GetPosition() { return m_Position; }
00077     PLT_StateVariable* GetRelatedStateVariable() { return m_RelatedStateVariable; }
00078     bool               HasReturnValue() { return m_HasReturnValue; }
00079 
00080 protected:
00081     NPT_String         m_Name;
00082     NPT_Ordinal        m_Position;
00083     NPT_String         m_Direction;
00084     PLT_StateVariable* m_RelatedStateVariable;
00085     bool               m_HasReturnValue;
00086 };
00087 
00088 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 |   PLT_Argument
00090 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 class PLT_Argument
00099 {
00100 public:
00101     PLT_Argument(PLT_ArgumentDesc& arg_desc);
00102 
00103     // class methods
00104     static NPT_Result CreateArgument(PLT_ActionDesc& action_desc, 
00105                                      const char*     arg_name, 
00106                                      const char*     arg_value,
00107                                      PLT_Argument*&  arg);
00108 
00109     // accessor methods
00110     PLT_ArgumentDesc&  GetDesc() { return m_ArgDesc; }
00111     NPT_Ordinal        GetPosition() { return m_ArgDesc.GetPosition(); }
00112     NPT_Result         SetValue(const char* value);
00113     const NPT_String&  GetValue();
00114 
00115 private:
00116     NPT_Result         ValidateValue(const char* value);
00117     
00118 protected:
00119     PLT_ArgumentDesc&  m_ArgDesc;
00120     NPT_String         m_Value;
00121 };
00122 
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 |   PLT_ArgumentNameFinder
00125 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130 class PLT_ArgumentNameFinder
00131 {
00132 public:
00133     // methods
00134     PLT_ArgumentNameFinder(const char* name) : m_Name(name) {}
00135 
00136     bool operator()(PLT_Argument* const & argument) const {
00137         return argument->GetDesc().GetName().Compare(m_Name, true) ? false : true;
00138     }
00139 
00140 private:
00141     // members
00142     NPT_String m_Name;
00143 };
00144 
00145 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 |   PLT_ArgumentDescNameFinder
00147 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00152 class PLT_ArgumentDescNameFinder
00153 {
00154 public:
00155     // methods
00156     PLT_ArgumentDescNameFinder(const char* name) : m_Name(name) {}
00157 
00158     bool operator()(PLT_ArgumentDesc* const & arg_desc) const {
00159         return arg_desc->GetName().Compare(m_Name, true) ? false : true;
00160     }
00161 
00162 private:
00163     // members
00164     NPT_String m_Name;
00165 };
